page.title: 04RECREATION : CHASING GAMES
page.content: OFF GROUND TOUCH.This is a game that involves running about.One person is on it and has to try and catch you but if you sit on something like a bench they cannot get you. LINE TOUCH. This game is for two people or more.One person is on it and he or she has to chase the others on the lines.If anyone goes off the lines they are on it. CROCODILES.Crocodiles is a game that Karen Tullet, Lisa Griffin and Lizzie Kinsella made up.You need a paved courtyard and three or more players.One player is on it and stands in the middle of the courtyard.The others have to run across the courtyard without stepping on the lines and without getting caught.
